title: (x) copperplate script The Sweet Shop logo - calligraphy {Dav}
content:
Can anyone ID the font used in the logo on this site?

[http://www.thesweetshop.tv](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112171956/http:/www.thesweetshop.tv/)
author: matthewbuchanan

comments.content:
Custom Lettering..  
_( Take a closer look at the connections between those characters.. )_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051112171956/http:/www.formlos.net/)

Thanks for the ID. If it is Copperplate Script then there’s been a ton of custom work on it. The tails of the two capital “S”s are quite different and Copperplate Script doesn’t appear to contain any ligatures that would enable this easily.
that “formlos” font is really i nice one - self made or is it a font?
Oh yes, it was a particularly driven font.
